cards.name: Merge PDF
cards.label: Merge PDF
cards.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

cards.name: Split PDF
cards.label: Split PDF
cards.description: Seperate one pageor a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

cards.name: Compress PDF
cards.label: Compress PDf
cards.description: Reduce file size into optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

cards.name: PDF to Word
cards.label: PDF to Word
cards.description: Easily convert your PDF files into easy to edit DOC and DOCX documents. The converted WORD document is almost 100% accurate.

cards.name: Powerpoint to PDF
cards.label: Powerpoint to PDF
cards.description: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.

cards.name: Excel to Pdf
cards.label: Excel to PDF
cards.description: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

cards.name: Edit PDF
cards.label: Edit PDF
cards.description: Add text, images, shapes or freehand annotations to a PDF document. Edit the size, font, and color of the added content.

cards.name: PDF to JPG
cards.label: PDF to JPG
cards.description: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

cards.name: JPG TO PDF
cards.label: JPG TO PDF
cards.description: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

cards.name: Sign PDF
cards.label: Sign PDF
cards.description: Sign yourself or request electronic signatures from others.

cards.name: Watermark
cards.label: Watermark
cards.description: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

cards.name: Rotate PDF
cards.label: Rotate PDF
cards.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

cards.name: HTML to PDF
cards.label: HTML to PDF
cards.description: Convert webpages in HTML to PDF. Copy and paste the URL of the page you want and convert it to PDF with a click.

cards.name: unlock PDF
cards.label: Unlock PDF
cards.description: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

cards.name: Protect PDF
cards.label: Protect PDF
cards.description: Protect PDF files with a password. Encrypt PDF documents to prevent unauthorized access.

cards.name: Organize PDF
cards.label: Organize PDF
cards.description: Sort pages of your PDF file however you like. Delete PDF pages or add PDF pages to your document at your convenience.

cards.name: PDF to PDF/A
cards.label: PDF to PDF/A
cards.description: Transform your PDF to PDF/A, the ISO-standardized version of PDF for long-term archiving. Your PDF will preserve formatting when accessed in the future.

cards.name: Repair PDF
cards.label: Repair PDF
cards.description: Repair a damaged PDF and recover data from corrupt PDF. Fix PDF files with our Repair tool.

cards.name: Page Number
cards.label: Page Number
cards.description: Add page numbers into PDFs with ease. Choose your positions, dimensions, typography.

cards.name: Scan to PDF
cards.label: Scan to PDF
cards.description: Capture document scans from your mobile device and send them instantly to your browser.

cards.name: OCR PDF
cards.label: OCR PDF
cards.description: Easily convert scanned PDF into searchable and selectable documents.
